short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Basic extension that when enabled, it automatically downloads all the webP images as a PNG.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Basic extension that when enabled, it automatically downloads all the webP images as a PNG.  Any problems/bugs or new features you can post them here: https://github.com/humblewolfstudio/webp-png-extension/issues
